title: The "Trying to Find Someone Who Was Not Assaulted By Donald Trump" Edition
description:
David Plotz, Emily Bazelon and John
Dickerson discuss the sexual assault allegations against Donald
Trump, the latest from WikiLeaks on Hillary Clinton and whether its
ethical to choose not to vote in this election.
Fill out our survey: megaphone.fm/survey
